name: Valve Map File
summary: Learn about .VMF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Valve Corporation develops Hammer Editor to allow users to design 3D environments by placing objects, applying textures, configuring lighting, and defining interactive elements using an entity-based system. Earlier versions of Valve Hammer Editor saved maps in the .MAP format, which is still used in some cases for interoperability. However, the VMF format is a more structured format that allows modders to easily edit, share, and troubleshoot maps before compiling them into the playable BPS format used by the game engine.

instructions: You can open VMF files with Valve Hammer Editor in Windows. To open a VMF file with the program, select File â†’ Open.
QuArK is another Windows utility that modders can use to open and edit VMF files.
